scripts.network: hc s clean && pnpm build:happ && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=8888 concurrently -k "pnpm -F ui start" "pnpm launch" "hc playground" "pnpm local-services"
scripts.launch: echo pass | WEBKIT_DISABLE_DMABUF_RENDERER=1 RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/messenger-demo.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT
scripts.package: nix build -L .#messenger-demo_happ -o workdir/messenger-demo.happ && pnpm -F ui package && hc web-app pack workdir
